product_name: Boardworks B-Ray Stand Up Paddle Board with Paddle - 11'6"
long_description: Plenty wide with ample glide, the B-Ray is the perfect introductory SUP board. Soft on the top and padded rails for extra comfort and durability, the B-Ray is a fun board for the whole family.
short_description: Plenty wide with ample glide, the B-Ray is the perfect introductory SUP board. Soft on the top and padded rails for extra comfort and durability, the B-Ray is a fun board for the whole family.
